summary.para: Contains information associated with audio descriptions. This structure is used with the function when the SPI_GETAUDIODESCRIPTION or SPI_SETAUDIODESCRIPTION action value is specified.

remarks.para: To compile an application that uses this structure, define _WIN32_WINNT as 0x0600 or later. For more information, see Using the Windows Headers.

summary.para: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member to sizeof(AUDIODESCRIPTION).
If this member is TRUE, audio descriptions are enabled; Otherwise, this member is FALSE.
The locale identifier (LCID) of the language for the audio description. For more information, see Locales and Languages.
